titleStmt.title: A proclamation appointing the heretors to be in readiness upon fourty eight hours advertisement
Proclamations. 1693-01-12
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the twelfth day of January. and of our reign the fourth year, 1693.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
